headline: NextEra Energy (NEE) Drops 6% as Strong Performance Long Priced In
summary: We recently published Wall Street’s 10 Worst Performing Stocks. NextEra Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NEE) is one of the worst performers on Wednesday. NextEra Energy saw its share prices decrease by 6.09 percent on Wednesday to close at $72.82 apiece, despite reporting better earnings, as investors appeared to have already expected and priced in a strong performance during the […]

headline: NextEra Energy board declares quarterly dividend
summary: The board of directors of NextEra Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NEE) declared a regular quarterly common stock dividend of $0.5665 per share. The dividend is payable on Sept. 15, 2025, to shareholders of record on Aug. 28, 2025.

headline: Trump’s big bill is ‘tough but constructive’ for renewables: NextEra
summary: Analysts on the call were skeptical of NextEra’s claims that the company could avoid losing tax credits for its projects.

headline: This Magnificent Dividend Stock Continues to Deliver Powerful Growth
summary: NextEra Energy delivered strong earnings growth in the second quarter, powered by robust renewable energy demand.  The company remains on track to deliver high-end earnings growth through 2027.  NextEra Energy (NYSE: NEE) has done a magnificent job paying dividends over the years.

headline: What Breadcrumbs From NextEra Disclosures Mean For Eos Energy
summary: NextEra's shift to US battery suppliers and massive storage backlog signal huge opportunity for Eos Energy's growth & valuation. Read what investors need to know.
